sentence: Seeking to influence a primary in North Carolina's 11th Congressional District, Sen. Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) announced on Thursday that he will endorse state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R) in his primary challenge against Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), as the freshman congressman faces blowback from within his own party over recent comments his colleagues insist have been damaging falsehoods (The Hill).
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Morning Report  Will Biden's oil release work?

sentence: Seeking to influence a primary in North Carolina's 11th Congressional District, Sen. Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) announced on Thursday that he will endorse state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R) in his primary challenge against Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), as the freshman congressman faces blowback from within his own party over recent comments his colleagues insist have been damaging falsehoods (The Hill).
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Morning Report  Will Biden's oil release work?

sentence: Sen. Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) and a PAC aligned with him have helped Chuck Edwards, a primary challenger of embattled Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.).
title: Post Politics Now Biden issues first pardons, commutations of his presidency

sentence: EXCLUSIVE Rep. Madison Cawthorn may have violated federal insider trading laws as he hyped up an alleged pump-and-dump cryptocurrency scheme, multiple watchdog groups told the Washington Examiner.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Madison Cawthorn implicated in potential insider trading scheme, experts say
